game_description: Life as we know doensâ€™t exist, hordes of undead and demons have emerged and now rule the earth. The human race was forced to live in underground shelters in order to survive. To take what used to be theirs, humanity gathered forces and established small specialised teams to eliminate the threat. This action was called Project Rest in Pieces, aka R.I.P . Now itâ€™s up to you, to save what remains... MAIN FEATURES - 20 Weapons to choose from and upgrade their stats and skins - Melee combat from knife to Katana - Customizable Locomotion and Dual Weapon Mechanics - Snap and Smooth Turning - Blood & Gore Dismemberments - 3 Mission type Levels + 3 Horde Levels for unlimited play - Multiplatform Global Scoreboards to compete with other players - 6 Specialized Perks to use in combat - 8 Agents to choose, with leveling system - 34 Avatars for prestige - PickUp items to boost your efficiency - Training level with Tutorial guidance - 5 Difficulty levels per Mission - AAA Quality Graphics and SFX
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: For a $4 game?? The graphics are amazing, best out of any game Iâ€™ve played in my quest, the gameplay is interesting, enjoyable, and very replay able. This game could be $15 and I still think it would be worth it. There are so many different guns and melees to choose from and you can level up to unlock them and to unlock the coins which you can buy upgrades for them.
review_3: I tried to refund and contacted support and they couldn't help.
review_4: So very fun and it actually made me jump a few times
review_5: This game is worth way more than 3.99 really fun and it would be awesome if it had a co-op feature
